apple_vendor_description: The couple with heart emoji on Apple devices depicts two figures, a woman with a dark skin tone and a person with a medium-light skin tone, embracing with a prominent heart above them. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients imbue the figures and the heart with a warm, loving glow, while soft rounded edges enhance their gentle form. This emoji beautifully symbolizes romantic love, strong relationships, and affection, adding a deeply personal touch to communications on Apple devices.
